amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the closure or transfer of the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the closure or transfer of the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jolly amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
